name: Household of Faith (HOF Grambling)
desc: Campus ministry group fostering faith, fellowship, and spiritual growth.

name: Chess Club
desc: For chess enthusiasts: come play, compete, and develop skills.

name: Math Club
desc: Support for mathematics students, problem solving sessions, peer tutoring.

name: ColorStack Grambling
desc: Chapter to support underrepresented students in computing and tech fields.

name: National Society of Black Engineers (NSBE)
desc: Promotes excellence in STEM for Black students; networking, workshops, events.

name: Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc.
desc: Develop leaders, promote brotherhood and academic excellence.

name: Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc.
desc: To encourage honorable achievement in all fields of endeavor.

name: Omega Psi Phi Fraternity, Inc.
desc: Brings together men of high ideals, stimulate ambitions, foster dignity.

name: Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity, Inc.
desc: Culture for service, service for humanity.

name: Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc.
desc: Promotes educational development, social action, and community service.
